programmes.show_description: Haunting thriller with Donald Sutherland. Shattered by the mysterious disappearance of his wife, a hit-man sets out to track down the shadowy figures responsible. (1977)
Western revenge drama. After killing the man who murdered his parents, a young cowboy on the run is taken in by a mysterious old man, who may not have his best interests in mind. (1991)

Put the pleasure back into shopping from the comfort of your home and choose from a selection of innovative products.
Action adventure starring Dina Meyer (Starship Troopers). An astronomer and a cryptographer unwittingly unearth a murderous Sphinx and must solve deadly puzzles to trap it back in its tomb. (2008)

Sci-fi action thriller with Chris Evans. Two Americans with psychic abilities must find a girl in Hong Kong before a shadowy government organisation does. (2009)
Crime thriller with Sylvester Stallone. After suffering a brain injury, the only surviving thief from a bank heist is given an experimental drug to rebuild his memory and help crack the case. (2018)
Vigilante thriller with Alien's Tom Skerritt. Tired of the crime in his neighbourhood, a deli owner takes matters into his own hands and forms a civilian patrol to keep the streets clean. (1982)
